Text: Thank you for posting this, I almost went to sleep.
This issue has one of the finest artworks I've seen in a long time,Reiss is at the top of his game,just pay attention to all the details...
75 MBs? Really? Again with this crap?  I'm simply going to have to start download less comics.
Gary Frank back-up art is good too, mirrormaster82. I agree though on Reis, this is probably his best work. The Clark-Diana date = good stuff. The disaster downtown = great stuff.
